message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm starting the price at $18,000. I'm confident you'll see this as a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be realistic, I can't go as low as $10,000. How about we meet closer to the middle at $14,000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I hope we can come to an agreement.
